2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='PackageDeclaration'>
        <property name='id' value='PackageDeclaration'/>
        <property name='format' value='^package\\s.*;$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='ImportControl'>
        <property name='id' value='ImportControl'/>
        <property name='option' value='bottom'/>
        <property name='eachGroupHasLineSeparator' value='true'/>
        <property name='eachGroupHasBlankLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='OneTopLevelClass'>
        <property name='id' value='OneTopLevelClass'/>
        <property name='allowMultipleTopLevelClasses' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
3.1 License or copyright information, if:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Header'>
        <property name='headerType' value='REGEXP'/>
        <property name='headerFile' value='LICENSE|COPYING'/>
        <property name='fileExtensions' value='java'/>
        <property name='charset' value='UTF-8'/>
        <property name='allowCommentAfterHeader' value='false'/>
        <property name='header' value='/*\\n * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");\\n * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\\n * You may obtain a copy of the License at\\n *\\n *     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\\n *\\n * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\\n * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,\\n * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\\n * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\\n * limitations under the License.\\n */'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='CustomImportOrder'>
        <property name='customImportOrder' value='STATIC###STANDARD'/>
        <property name='separated' value='true'/>
        <property name='special-imports' value='STATIC'/>
    </module>"
}

4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='NeedBraces'>
                        <property name='id' value='NeedBraces'/>
                        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
                    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_DO, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='NoLineWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='not'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF, TYPE_BOUND_AMP, CATCH_TYPE_UNION'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.3 Horizontal alignment: never requir:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4.7 Grouping parentheses: recommended:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='UnnecessaryParentheses'>
                        <property name='allowInMethodInvocation' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInMethodDeclaration' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInConstructorDeclaration' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInExplicitConstructorCall' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInConditionalExpression' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInInstanceof' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInReturn' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInUnaryExpression' value='false'/>
                    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
                        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
                        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
                    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
        <property name='illegalFormat' value='^[A-Z]|[_]'/>
        <property name='message' value='Package name must be in lowercase and not contain underscores'/>
    </module>"
}
5.3 Camel case: defined:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AbbreviationAsWordInName'>
        <property name='id' value='AbbreviationAsWordInName'/>
        <property name='format' value='([a-z][a-z0-9]*)([A-Z][a-z0-9]*)*'/>
        <property name='message' value='Abbreviations should not be used as words in names.'/>
        <property name='ignoreFinal' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
7.1.2 Paragraphs:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='JavadocParagraph'>
                        <property name='allowEmptyParagraphs' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowMultipleParagraphs' value='true'/>
                        <property name='allowSingleParagraph' value='false'/>
                      </module>"
}
7.1.3 Block tags:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='JavadocBlockTagLocation'>
        <property name='allowAtLineStart' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMultipleDefinitions' value='false'/>
        <property name='blockTagOrder' value='param,return,throws,deprecated'/>
        <property name='indentation' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
